_header: This day Saint Matthew tells us
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4726.
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-third Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
TO daie sainte mathew telles vsHow fals men temptid
                    iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor criste þaim sette qwamteli at
                    hameþis es þe text of oure gospell als fer forthe etc
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO dai seint Matheu telleþ vsHou false men fonded
                    Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe by a tale I witeAnd ȝe wole I schal
                    telle ow hite
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þis day Seynt Matheu telles vsHowe false men come to fonde
                    ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat may we by a story witteOf whilk we rede in holi
                    writte

CULDd11.First Lines:
This day seynt Mathew telliþ vsHow fals men com to fond
                    ihesus…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…þat may we be a stori witeWher of we rede in holi
                    write
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica vicesima tercia Post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium
                        secundum Matheum Aventes pharisei consilium inierunt vt caperunt ihesum in
                        sermone & cetera (f. 209)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Þis day saynt matheu tellys vsHow fals men temped [sic]
                    ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe by a tale weteAnd yf ȝe wyll I sall
                    tell yt
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxiijma post trinitatem secundum matheum (f.
                    151)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TO day seint Matheu telleþ vsHou false men fonded
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe bi a tale I witeAnd ȝe wol I schal
                    telle owhite
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
To day saynte mathew tels vsHow fals men fondide
                    Ihesus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe be a tale here wyte& yfe ȝe
                    wyle ȝe may here yte

HunHM129.First Lines:
To day seint mathew tellyth vsHow flas [sic] men fandyt
                    ihesus…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat ȝe may here by atale wytAnd ȝyff ȝe
                    will I woll tell hyt
HunHM129.Attributed Title: Dominica vicesima tercia post festum trinitatis (f. 193)
